thread.section_title: Jacobtime Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Jacobtime | www.jacobtime.com
thread.title: C Jones

author: C Jones
title: C Jones
text: I've had my new Citizens Chronograph long enough to be comfortable with most of it's many functions. The price was absolutely the lowest that I found for a new example of the watch I selected. They had every variation of virtually every watch I was considering. When I placed my order, I received reassuring emails and very quickly received my new watch. The original factory packaging was perfectly intact and all the instructions were in place. I programmed the watch, it perfected its time setting over night. I just get to watch the watch. It does everything. Its great! Thank you for making the world's most accurate watch available at an affordable price.
